mapper.select: SELECT M.MENU_ID, MENU_MAIN_TITLE, MENU_SUB_TITLE, MENU_CONTENT, MENU_PRICE, MENU_NEW, MENU_TYPE, MENU_REG_DATE, MENU_CHECK_COUNT, MENU_STATE, MENU_START_DAY, MENU_IMAGE_NAME, MENU_IMAGE_EXTENTION, MENU_IMAGE_ROUTE FROM MENU M LEFT OUTER JOIN MENU_IMAGE MI ON M.MENU_ID = MI.MENU_MENU_ID WHERE M.MENU_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU(MENU_MAIN_TITLE, MENU_SUB_TITLE, MENU_CONTENT, MENU_PRICE, MENU_NEW, MENU_TYPE, MENU_CHECK_COUNT, MENU_STATE, MENU_START_DAY) VALUES(#{menuMainTitle}, #{menuSubTitle}, #{menuContent}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuNew}, #{menuType}, #{menuCheckCount}, #{menuState}, #{menuStartDay})
INSERT INTO MENU_IMAGE(MENU_MENU_ID, MENU_IMAGE_NAME, MENU_IMAGE_EXTENTION, MENU_IMAGE_ROUTE) VALUES(#{menuMenuId}, #{menuImageName}, #{menuImageExtention}, #{menuImageRoute})

INSERT INTO IAT(MENU_MENU_ID, IAT_FULL_SUPPLY, IAT_ONE_SUPPLY, IAT_WEIGHT, IAT_KCAL, IAT_SUGARS, IAT_PROTEIN, IAT_SATURATED_FAT, IAT_NATRIUM) VALUES(#{menuMenuId}, #{iatFullSupply}, #{iatOneSupply}, #{iatWeight}, #{iatKcal}, #{iatSugars}, #{iatProtein}, #{iatSaturatedFat}, #{iatNatrium})
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU SET MENU_MAIN_TITLE = #{menuMainTitle}, MENU_SUB_TITLE = #{menuSubTitle}, MENU_CONTENT = #{menuContent}, MENU_PRICE = #{menuPrice}, MENU_NEW = #{menuNew}, MENU_TYPE = #{menuType}, MENU_CHECK_COUNT = #{menuCheckCount}, MENU_STATE = #{menuState}, MENU_START_DAY = #{menuStartDay} WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId};
